com.google.code.ssm.config

Interface AddressChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheFactory

    public interface AddressChangeListener
    Changes addresses of cache servers. Each time the method is invoked cache's clients are recreated using the new addresses, this recreation is transparent for other beans which use cache client.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Jakub Bia≈Çek
